titleStmt.title: A message from both Houses of Parliament unto His Majestie, concerning the prince, his son. With the ansvver of His Majestie thereunto. Together with His Majesties answer to the desire of both Houses concerning the militia.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I).

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: And by the Assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: The answer concerning the militia was seperately published with title: His Maiesties letter to the Lord Keeper: together with his message to both Houses of Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majestie: And
